metadata.title: CVE-2022-1238 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds Write in libr/bin/format/ne/ne.c in GitHub repositoryradareorg/radare2 prior to 5.6.8. This vulnerability is heap overflow andmay be exploitable. For more general description of heap buffer overflow,see [CWE](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/122.html).

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
